item.title: Barrows question
item.dc:creator: @nacnac nacnac
item.description:
@nacnac wrote:

ok i saw a code similar that was trimming somehting and i was like hey, that would work great with barrows! so i took 25 min and coded the whole code 4 every barrow but it didnt work so i took a break from it and i wanna ask the community if it would work heres sum of it its basicly chiseling the barrows set and giving u barrows.

//Barrows by NacNac if((itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 15440))//dharocks { if(playerLevel[12] >= 1) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1755, 1)==false) { sendMessage("You do not have a Chisel in your inventory."); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(1755, 1)==true) { deleteItem(15440, getItemSlot(15440), 1); setAnimation(2914); addItem(10772, 1, 10773, 1, 10774, 1, 10775, 1); addSkillXP(2000000, 12); sendMessage("You got dharocks!"); } } }

*note i give 50% to the person whom inspired meh

Read full topic
